summary: Sir Walter Raleigh (Richard Todd) overcomes court intrigue to win favor with Queen Elizabeth I (Bette Davis) in order to get financing for a proposed voyage to the New World.

keywords: queen elizabeth i|year 1581|knight|elizabethan era|queen of england
title: El favorito de la reina
